column2: GW Pharmaceuticals Plc is a biopharmaceutical company, which engages in the discovery, development, and commercialization of novel therapeutics. The company is headquartered in Cambridge, Cambridgeshire and currently employs 791 full-time employees. The firm's lead cannabinoid product candidate is Epidiolex, which is a liquid formulation of pure plant-derived cannabidiol (CBD). The firm offers Sativex (nabiximols), which is indicated for the treatment of spasticity due to multiple sclerosis (MS). The firm is also focused on developing its pharmaceutical product pipelines, which includes Epidiolex for the treatment of Tuberous Sclerosis Complex and RETT Syndrome.
Sovereign House, Vision Park, Chivers Way
